requirementsDescription: Complete the tasks below to claim your rewards. You can always go back and check the information if youâ€™re not sure how.

WelcomeToRadQuest.title: Welcome to RadQuest
WelcomeToRadQuest.introDescription: Welcome to RadQuest! This is your first step to becoming a Radix expert. Complete the quests to earn rewards and learn more about Radix.

WhatIsRadix.title: Introduction to Radix
WhatIsRadix.description: Become familiar with the Radix network
WhatIsRadix.introDescription: Radix is a decentralized network that aims to solve the scalability problem of blockchain technology. Learn more about Radix and how it works.

GetRadixWallet.title: The Radix Wallet
GetRadixWallet.description: Get set up with the Radix Wallet
GetRadixWallet.introDescription: The Radix Wallet is your gateway to the Radix network. Download the wallet and get started.

LoginWithWallet.title: Login with Wallet
LoginWithWallet.introDescription: Login with your Radix Wallet to start earning rewards.

FirstTransactionQuest.title: First Transaction
FirstTransactionQuest.introDescription: Make your first transaction on the Radix network to earn your first reward.
FirstTransactionQuest.allowMarketing: I allow RadQuest to add me to the marketing newsletter
